definition[0]: used to talk about arrangements for the future
example[0]: Audrey and Jimmy are to be married in June.
example[1]: Two men are to appear in court on charges of armed robbery.
definition[1]: used to give an order or to tell someone about a rule

example[3]: All staff are to wear uniforms.
definition[2]: used to say or ask what someone should do or what should happen

definition[3]: used to ask how something can be done
example[6]: How are we to get out of the present mess?
